servinfo.title: Inspection of Keyless Start Control Module and Its Circuits
servinfo.ptxt: Keyless start control module and its circuits can be checked at keyless start control module wiring couplers by measuring voltage and resistance.

attention2.ptxt: Keyless start control module cannot be checked by itself. It is strictly prohibited to connect voltmeter or ohmmeter to keyless start control module with coupler disconnected from it.

s1.ptxt: Remove keyless start control module from vehicle body referring to Keyless Start Control Module Removal and Installation .
Connect connector to keyless start control module.
Check voltage at each terminal number of couplers connected.

item.ptxt: As each terminal voltage is affected by the battery voltage, confirm that it is 11 V or more when ignition switch is ON.
Voltage with asterisk (*) cannot be measured by voltmeter because it is pulse signal.

entry.ptxt: Keyless start control module connector (viewed from harness side)
Ground for keyless start control module
Ignition switch is at all positions
Ignition switch is at all positions
Ignition switch is at ACC or ON position
Ignition switch is at any position other than ACC or ON position
Insert ignition key to ignition key cylinder
Pull out ignition key from ignition key cylinder
Ignition switch is at ON position
Ignition switch is at any position other than ON position
Request switch of driver side door is released
Request switch of driver side door is pushed
Power supply for steering lock unit
Ignition knob switch is at any position other than ON and OFF position
Request switch of rear end door is at any position other than ON position
Request switch of rear end door is at ON position
When pushing ignition knob switch of steering lock unit
When releasing ignition knob switch of steering lock unit
Request switch of passenger side door is at any position other than ON position
Request switch of passenger side door is at ON position

topic.ptxt: Driver, passenger and rear end door antenna request signals (Request signal (1) transmitted by each door antenna when each door request switch is pushed)

entry.ptxt: Request switch of each door is pushed with remote controller carried

topic.ptxt: (Request signal (1) transmitted by center antenna when each door request switch is pushed)

item.ptxt: Ignition knob switch of steering lock unit is pushed
Request switch of each door is pushed with remote controller carried

topic.ptxt: (Request signal (1) transmitted by luggage room antenna when each door request switch is pushed)

entry.ptxt: Request switch of each door is pushed with remote controller carried
Ignition switch is at ON position

topic.ptxt: (Signal (1) communicated between keyless start control module and steering lock unit when measurement condition described below applies)

item.ptxt: Ignition knob switch of steering lock unit is pushed
Request switch of each door is pushed with remote controller carried

topic.ptxt: Driver and passenger side door lock switch signals.
In case the position of driver and passenger side door lock is changed from the unlock to the lock.

entry.ptxt: Press lock side of manual door lock switch

topic.ptxt: In case the position of passenger side door lock is changed from the lock to the unlock when the position of driver and passenger side door is at the lock

entry.ptxt: Driver door is at lock position and passenger side door is at unlock position

topic.ptxt: In case the position of driver side door lock is changed from the lock to the unlock when the position of driver and passenger side door is at the lock.

entry.ptxt: Driver door is at unlock position and passenger side door is at lock position

topic.ptxt: In case the position of driver and passenger side door lock is changed from the lock to the unlock.

entry.ptxt: Driver door is at unlock position and passenger side door is at lock position
